info.description: Grafana panel plugin for visualizing 3D model data (e.g. glTF) via WebGL. Provides model URL loading (CORS friendly), quaternion-based rotation, flexible centering modes, camera and light configuration (directional & ambient), dataâ€‘driven dynamic control from datasource fields, optional mouse camera interaction, and helper axes/center visualization. Ideal for attitude/orientation and viewpoint visualization from timeâ€‘series data.
